title: 116 84 24 "Trading Faces""Transformed into Nami! Bon Clay's Rapid-Fire Ballet Kenpo!"Transliteration: "Nami ni henshin! Bonkurē renpatsu baree Kenpō" (Japanese:ナミに変身!ボンクレ-連発バレエ拳法) Ken Koyama Michiru Shimada June 23, 2002(2002-06-23)[72] March 24, 2007[73][74]
